thread.title: Pass or fail after 13 years of trying?
thread.title_full: Pass or fail after 13 years of trying? - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Pass or fail after 13 years of trying?
text:
She's spent Â£6,000 and 13 years trying to pass her driving test but at last, after going through six different instructors, Janine Mars from Chatham has finally been given her licence.
The 31-year-old building site manager is now going car shopping and, as David Johns found out, she thinks people on the roads of Medway have nothing to fear!
Play video Travel Driving test janine mars
